title: If you go from 0 honor level  and 14 days ban  to level 2 honor ,is your next punishment perma ban ?
body: Can you after 14 days ban punishment ,and  reform to level 2, or even level 5 honor level get chat ban as next punishment, or there is no reset and next punishment is always perma ban?

replies.body:
As far as I know, no. It takes significantly longer to de-escalate from a 14-day ban than to get back to honor level 2.

It *does* go back down eventually (happened to some guy here who was confused because he got a 14 day ban after his previous punishment was a 14 day ban), but it takes *tons* of games of good behavior. Maybe from 0 to 5 would do it...But just remember you're looking at a huge number of games either way.

It's best to just assume you're about to be permabanned until you receive confirmation differently.
Ok.I get it.But when does it reset ?Is there any official information?is it at honor level 2 or honor level 5 or???
It takes between three and six months of regular playing with good behavior to drop each punishment tier.
